pages.text: $(item)Mud$() is naturally occurring in swamps and rivers.$(p)$(info) Harvesting $(item)Mud$() with a low tier $(thing)shovel$() will increase the chance of obtaining $(item)Mud Clumps$() instead of $(item)Mud$().
$(item)Mud$() can also be created by $(thing)compacting$() $(item)Mud Clumps$() or $(thing)soaking$() $(item)Dirt$().
